reviews.text:
A nice quiet mosque situated amongst bungalows and landed property.

I had the pleasure of visiting this place, Alhamdulillah, after hearing how nice and tranquil it is.

Alhamdulillah for this mosque. Serves the Muslims working at Novena area. Decor inside is quite charming. Inspired by Balinese/Nusantara architecture, I believe. The mosque has two levels, though the second level was closed off when I was there for Zuhr prayers. Public parking is available at Revenue House, just a few mins walk away.
Alhamdulillah. A mosque tucked in the heart of private houses in the Novena precinct. Just a 10mins walk from Novena MRT.

I went there to drop a Quran as I’m travelling overseas and I have other copies and the only way is to drop in a masjid.
Than the old man there told me that I need a permission to drop the Quran there which is wrong and anti dine m.
More then that I told him why I need permission to drop Quran in bayti allah with the other books.
He answered this is a private property.
Wrong again this is a masjid bayt allah.
It’s not private it belongs to god and the believers.
And I don’t need a permission to go in nor to drop a quran.
I think you guys should read more of the quran to understand what does mean Al yusr.
God bless you all.
Hope this help with deeper reflection and help change a bad way to do things.

Road all blocked by the people going to mosque. Everyone illegally parked. Some also blocked the residents there.
Avoid Fridays, avoid lunch time
